description: Interface for Uniswap V3 factory contract

functions.name: getPool
functions.signature: function getPool(address tokenA, address tokenB, uint24 fee) external view returns (address pool)
functions.description: Returns the pool address for given token pair and fee

functions.name: createPool
functions.signature: function createPool(address tokenA, address tokenB, uint24 fee) external returns (address pool)
functions.description: Creates a new pool for the given tokens and fee

functions.name: owner
functions.description: Returns the current owner of the factory

functions.name: feeAmountTickSpacing
functions.signature: function feeAmountTickSpacing(uint24 fee) external view returns (int24)
functions.description: Returns the tick spacing for the given fee amount

events.name: PoolCreated
events.signature: PoolCreated(address indexed token0, address indexed token1, uint24 indexed fee, int24 tickSpacing, address pool)
events.description: Emitted when a new pool is created
